channel.title: CVE Feed for devowl -- Real Media Library: Media Library Folder & File Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for devowl -- Real Media Library: Media Library Folder & File Manager

item.title: CVE-2023-0253|2024-08-02T05:02:44.108Z -- devowl -- real%20media%20library%3A%20media%20library%20folder%20%26%20file%20manager
item.description: The Real Media Library: Media Library Folder & File Manager plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via folder names in versions up to, and including, 4.18.28 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with author-level permissions and above to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-2027|2024-08-01T18:56:22.513Z -- devowl -- real%20media%20library%3A%20media%20library%20folder%20%26%20file%20manager
item.description: The Real Media Library: Media Library Folder & File Manager plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via its style attributes in all versions up to, and including, 4.22.7 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor access or above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-2027|2024-06-04T17:29:11.978Z -- devowl -- real%20media%20library%3A%20media%20library%20folder%20%26%20file%20manager
item.description: The Real Media Library: Media Library Folder & File Manager plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via its style attributes in all versions up to, and including, 4.22.7 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor access or above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-2328|2024-06-04T17:29:41.063Z -- devowl -- real%20media%20library%3A%20media%20library%20folder%20%26%20file%20manager
item.description: The Real Media Library: Media Library Folder & File Manager plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the image title and alt text in all versions up to, and including, 4.22.11 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with author access and higher, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.description: The Real Media Library: Media Library Folder & File Manager plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the image title and alt text in all versions up to, and including, 4.22.11 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with author access and higher, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
